data.title: Prince Ludwig Heinrich of Bavaria Biography and Replies
data.meta_description: Born Ludwig Heinrich on 14 June 1982 in Landsberg am Lech to Their Royal Highnesses Prince Luitpold and Princess Katrin of Bavaria. data.text:
Born Ludwig Heinrich on 14 June 1982 in Landsberg am Lech to Their Royal Highnesses Prince Luitpold and Princess Katrin of Bavaria. He is the 3rd child and first born son of the couple.

He is third in line to The House of Wittelsbach and Titilar King of Bavaria due to the fact that his cousin The Duke of Bavaria never married and his cousin Prince Max Duke in Bavaria has five daughter and succession to the House of Wittelsbach obeys Agnatic Succession laws.

Education

Studied political science and law.

Trained by his cousin His Royal Highness The Duke of Bavaria in the Estate Management of The Royal House.

Parents

Prince Luitpold of Bavaria

Princess Katrin of Bavaria

Title

14 June 1982 – Present; His Royal Highness Prince Ludwig Heinrich of Bavaria.

Line of Succession

Franz, Duke of Bavaria
